name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 集成 ChatGpt, Bard - 无需 OpenAI 账号 - ChatFree

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chatfree是一款全能型AI助手，基于OpenAI ChatGPT 4 和 Google Bard，支持在会话中完成各种任务，如画图、写诗、写歌、写作等等。无论你是学生、老师、科研、程序员等任何角色，都可以利用Chatfree释放你的创造和生产力。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatFree的核心优势有以下几点：

会话中的多样任务：它不仅可以帮你与AI聊天，还可以帮你用自然语言完成各种任务，如“画一朵红玫瑰”，“写一首关于爱情的诗”，“写一首关于自由的歌”等等。它会根据你的输入，逐步生成输出，并且可以根据你的反馈，进行修改和完善。
幕后的强大AI模型：它基于OpenAI ChatGPT 4 和 Google Bard，这是世界上最先进的AI模型之二。它们可以理解你的输入，生成高质量的输出，并且从你的反馈中学习。它们还可以根据你的需求和喜好，适应不同的领域、语言和风格。
极具创意的社区提示：它还有一个活跃的社区，里面有来自各种背景的用户，他们会分享自己用ChatFree创作的作品，并且提供一些极具创意的提示词，如“画一个奇幻风景”，“写一首关于月亮的诗”，“写一首关于友谊的歌”等等。你可以根据这些提示词，尝试用它创作出不同的作品，也可以分享自己的提示词和作品，与其他用户互动和交流。
它是一款值得尝试的全能型AI助手，它可以帮你实现你的创意想法，提高你的技能和效率。无论你是想要学习新事物，还是想要快乐娱乐，或者想要快速完成任务，都可以下载它，让它成为你的专属AI伙伴！

ChatFree is an all-round AI assistant based on OpenAI ChatGPT 4 and Google Bard, supporting various tasks such as drawing, writing poems, writing songs, writing and more in conversations. Whether you are a student, researcher, programmer, teacher or any other role, you can use it to unleash your creativity and productivity. It's core advantages are as follows:

Versatile tasks in conversations: It can not only help you chat with AI, but also help you complete various tasks in natural language, such as "draw a red rose", "write a poem about love", "write a song about freedom" and so on. It will generate outputs step by step according to your input, and you can modify and improve them according to your feedback.
Powerful AI models behind the scenes: It is based on OpenAI ChatGPT 4 and Google Bard, two of the most advanced AI models in the world. They can understand your input, generate high-quality outputs, and learn from your feedback. They can also adapt to different domains, languages, and styles according to your needs and preferences.
Creative community prompts: It also has an active community, where users from various backgrounds share their works created with it, and provide some creative prompts, such as "draw a fantasy landscape", "write a poem about the moon", "write a song about friendship" and so on. You can try to create different works with it according to these prompts, or share your own prompts and works with other users and interact and communicate with them.
ChatFree is a worthwhile all-round AI assistant that can help you achieve your creative ideas, improve your skills and efficiency. Whether you want to learn new things, have fun, or complete tasks quickly, you can download it and let it be your exclusive AI partner!
